resources.string: Invalid access token. Please contact the app developer.
Issues are not enabled for the selected repository. Please contact the app developer.
An unexpected error occurred. Please contact the app developer.
Please enter your valid GitHub password
Please enter your valid GitHub username
The API is currently offline, no data can be retrieved or written.
The changed object is connected to hidden elements that will change with it.
This operation affects filtered attached objects!
The API responded with an error, please save your data and report the issue:\n\n
The area you are trying to download is too large or contains too much data.\n\nPlease zoom in farther and try again.
Stop tracking and delete any stored trackpoints. This cannot be undone.
Dims non-downloaded areas in locked mode.
You can set a non-standard API URL here. Should usually not be changed!
Amount of seconds to wait before auto-locking, 0 turns it off.
Select which elements are displayed on the notes, bugs and task layer.
GPS/GNSS parameters and other location providers.
Tile-based background imagery download and storage.
OSM API and configuration of other servers.
Close changesets by default upon saving.
If a highway end node is within this distance (in meters) of a highway it should be connected to it
Configure layers not in the default configuration.
Allow generation of presets from taginfo.
Allows use of hardware acceleration if and where supported, currently setting this has no effect.
Prevent screen from turning off to save power.
Automatically add preset when name suggestion is selected.
Turn on suggestions for the name tag.
Display, edit and create notes, bugs and tasks.
Radius (m) of externally triggered downloads, 0 centers only on map.
Where the "follow position" button will be positioned.
Always show the contextual menu if a selection is ambiguous.
Generate notifications for data with problems or notes
Add, edit, delete geocoders for the search functionality.
The minimum distance between for GPS/GNSS notifications, in meters. Lower values drain more battery.
The minimum time interval for GPS/GNSS location notifications, in milliseconds. Lower values drain more battery.
If no GPS/GNSS positioning is present or turned on, fall back to network provider.
Address of TCP NMEA source as host:port.
Only generate alerts (audio) for groups of notifications once
Show the icon of the best-matching preset above nodes.
Make the JS console available in "live" mode.
Provide large area for dragging nodes.
Don\'t ask to turn GPS/GNSS on if off.
Choose the style for the data layer.
Behaviour of the map screen on device orientation changes.
The farthest distance a problem or note can be from the current position to generate a notification.
Limit (in km/h) above which notes, bugs and task auto-download is suspended.
Limit (in km/h) above which auto-download is suspended.
Maximum number of inline values displayed in tag form.
Do not draw a way thicker than this.
Maximum number of threads for downloading tiles.
Maximum number of displayed notifications per type (min. 1).
URL for the imagery offset server.
Do not mistake it for the wiki password. Remember: It is stored and transmitted in plaintext!
Add and enable JOSM compatible presets
Type of scale displayed on the map.
Show camera icon on action bar.
Displays data stats and FPS in the lower left corner.
Displays area where an element can be selected.
Show the icon of best-matching preset above buildings.
Allow split action bar, use is device specific. Requires starting Vespucci again, and Android 4.0 or later.
Total storage used for caching tiles, in MB.
Use the â† key to undo in main edit view.
You only need configuration to upload OSM data if not using OAuth. Get an account at https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/new
Longitude must be within -180Â°/+180Â°, latitude within -85Â°/85Â°
Add any further info you believe might help and (optionally,) your e-mail address if you want feedback.\n\nThank you.

Vespucci crashed or encountered a serious issue the last time it ran.

Please help by clicking by 'OK' to send an error report.
Create OSM object from preset search
Data from the download would conflict with your edits. Please upload your data before trying again.
You are about to delete this element from a relation.
Deleting the note cannot be undone!
Really delete all tags for \"%1$s\" object?
You are about to delete a node that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any node carrying such relations may render it invalid.
You are about to delete a relation that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any such relation from such relations may render it invalid.
You are about to delete a way.\n\nYou can either keep all nodes, or delete those that only belong to this way and are tagless.
The way contains nodes outside of the downloaded area and cannot be deleted without creating an inconsistent state. Download all of it before trying again.
You are about to delete a way that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any way carrying such relations may render it invalid.
The %1$s relation has no members.\n\nLeaving it as is will make it non-editable in Vespucci.
MapSplit sources must have min and max zoom set
Version information missing in PBF file
This operation would create a way with too many nodes.
You already have existing GPX track data. You may want to cancel and save first.
Are you sure you want to exit?
OpenStreetMap display name not retrieved yet
Send with your OpenStreetMap display name
Vespucci could not change or save the file.
The selected area does not conform to API restrictions, please choose a different one.
Please consult the documentation on supported file formats and required data fields.
If you didn\'t cause the error, please file a bug report.
This is an easy to use custom preference, which opens a dialog with a number picker. The value gets automatically saved and you can set the default-, min- and maxValue conveniently in the XML.
Please insert decimal formatted coordinates (e.g. "52.333572","8.741185"). Lat. has to lay between -85.0 and +85.0, and Lon. has to lay between -175.0 and +175.0.
Unable to save MapRoulette API key
Clear GPX track and its waypoints
Go to start of GPX track
Please enter or select a valid filename
Could not connect to the OSM server now. Please check that you are connected to the Internet, or try again later.
The configured data source has no coverage here.
If you are using OAuth this is likely a bug, please send a problem report, if you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly.
The API couldn\'t find an existing element or changeset with the specified id.
This way is unreversible due to being tagged with directionally dependent attributes. Reversing it would break the tagging.
Occurrence in month - occurrence in month
Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please save your edits, start again, and load a smaller area.
Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please start again and load a smaller area.
Are you sure you want to pause tracking and exit?
Could not download preset file. The preset will not work.
Preset file downloaded. However, some missing icons were not.
The preset file is invalid. The preset will not work.

Could not connect to the OSM server because HTTPS negotiation failed. Try switching to a non-encrypted connection in the API preferences.
Type or tap for name suggestions
This suggestion can replace some tag values with more popular ones.
Use the â† arrow to abort
Download failed with error code %1$d, message %2$s
Use the â† arrow to save and exit
Double tap an empty space or use the â† arrow to exit

Inconsistent state detected, please send in the error report.

Long press is not available in simple mode
You merged elements with conflicting tag values, direction dependent semantics or different roles in the same relation. Please check the tags and roles and correct them if needed.
At least one geocoder has to be selected!
At least one preset has to be selected!
Set minimum zoom lower than maximum
Only new Notes can be moved
Object may be out of date
You have not changed anything yetâ€¦
No OAuth configuration available for current API, please set login and password.

Please allow OAuth access to your OSM account.
Communication error during authentication handshake, please try again.
Could not carry out OAuth handshake: %1$s
OAuth is not enabled for the current API.
Try uploading again after allowing OAuth access to your OSM account.
Timeout during authentication handshake, please try again.
You reversed a oneway street or a way with directionally dependent tags. Please check the tags and correct them if needed.
Download more data to edit this area.
You are trying to merge elements with conflicting tag values.\n\nPlease check the tags and correct them before trying again.
Could not save current state!\nThis a fatal error, trying to write an export file for later recovery with JOSM.
%1$s is not writeable by Vespucci.\nThis may be insufficient permissions or a technical issue with your device.
%1$s has changed on the server, upload first and then re-download
Serious issue with map tile database\n"%1$s"\nPlease consult our FAQ at https://vespucci.io/
Node is near element it could be connected to
Corrupted state file, used backup file instead.
Corrupted bug state file, used backup file instead.
GPS/GNSS positioning turned off, GPX tracking stopped
Recording a GPS track or auto-downloading
Vespucci is recording a GPX track or auto-downloading. To completly exit press the button below or the back button in the app.
You have made changes. Do you want to upload instead of discarding them?
The error code returned from the API or the message could not be processed.
Your unsaved changes will be discarded if you proceed.
New features and behaviour are detailed in the release notes.
This is a new Vespucci version
%1$s \nhas local version %2$d \nand was deleted on the server
%1$s \nwas deleted locally \nbut has references on the server
Some or all the data was not uploaded. Try again later.
An API with this URL already exists. However, you may add another one (e.g. to switch accounts easily).
The configuration URL does not contain valid data.
The length of the opening hours value is %1$d which is longer than the maximum of 255.\n\nPlease simplify the string before saving!
Weekdays with lunch break and late shopping

Thank you for installing Vespucci.

To get started you need to know three things:
  • tapping the lock icon in the upper left corner will switch between locked (no editing) and unlocked mode,
  • to edit OpenStreetMap you need to download the data for the area where you want to change something first (zoom in before attempting that),
  • to add a new object: tap the large green button and select what you want to add, then tap the position you want to locate it at.
You are all set to go now. Start mapping and have fun!

\n

Your device has \"soft keys\" that are hidden from view. Swipe from the bottom to show them again.
Can\'t add rule to invalid opening hours string. Please correct or delete!
If you are using OAuth, re-authenticate and try again. If you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly.
